timeline.message: #18501 sets felix to info and turns the osgiproxyservlet off by defualt

timeline.bodyText: this is not thread safe, is it suppose to be thread safe?
timeline.author: freddyucv

replies.bodyText: meaning, we need something like a sync block and a double null check here?
replies.author: wezell

replies.bodyText:
sync block and a double null check are bad for performance
I think the Bill Pugh Singleton is better
https://www.harinathk.com/java/singleton-bill-pugh-solution-enum/
replies.author: freddyucv

timeline.bodyText: Issue found: Use block level rather than method level synchronization
timeline.author: dev-dotcms

timeline.bodyText: Issue found: Avoid unused imports such as 'com.dotcms.util.CollectionsUtils'
timeline.author: dev-dotcms
